content: **errata ** the following rounds are missing from the pattern instructions round 3 and round 4 knit around this versatile baby blanket can be knit with any weight yarn using the needles appropriate for that yarn notes from designer genia planck edging suggestions you can add fringes or tassels or even pom-poms or for those handy with a crochet hook you can crochet a bit of a lace edge around variations you can also knit in stripes and on the even row throw in some purl stitches for a bit of texture it also works well with a variegated yarn
